wasare kapi penena apanayanakaruimpiriyal ti eksports samagama, shri lanka apanayanakaruwange jathika mandalaye 18 wana sammana pradanothsawayedi ‚Äúwasare wadathma kapi penana apanayanakaru‚Äù sammanayen pidum labiya. 2009 wasara sandaha ‚Äúshri lankawe hondama apanayana welenda namaya‚Äù sandaha sammanaya da ehidi himi karaganimata samath wiya.me sammana pradanothsawayedi rate aarthika sanwardhanayata kapi penena dayakathwayak laba demin ihala karyasadhanayak penwana shashri lankawe apanayanakaruwan sandaha sammana pradanaya kerini.sammana pradanothsawaya amathamin winisuru madulle sabhapathi aacharya uditha liyanage mahatha, jayagrahakayan thoraganimedi salaka balu karunu atharin jathyanthara welenda pola thula owunge welenda namayan sthanagatha wi athi aakaraya da ek karunak wu bawa pahadili kaleya.impiriyal ti eksports samagame kalamanakarana adhyaksha, jayantha karunarathna mahatha kiwe goliya aarthika arbudaya hethuwen jathyanthara welenda pole pawathi prathirodhi thaththwayanta muhuna demin wuwath pasugiya wasaredi samagamata warthagatha wishishta wardhanayak ha usas apanayana agayak penwimata haki wu bawayi.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
